content.detailedDescription:
early monday morning ,i was still working on my laptop. it was placed directly on my chest as i lay on my bed facing my large bay window. it had just rained and was particularly dark outside. no moon was showing due to the dense cloud cover. my room was silent and dark and only the faint light of my monitor was dimly lighting the room. at precisely 5:06am a very strong light appeared floating across my window very slowly. couldn't tell what it was but it was oddly bright flying below the clouds. it was maybe a a mile from me, 650 feet above and at 40 degrees from the horizon.
   i got up slowly and crossed the room.I have seen 3 strange craft in my life and when i was 6 six very many unusual things have happened to me from: missing time, migraines, chronic nosebleeds and that ever present dark silhouette at night staring over me.That's for another time. so, i went to the window trying not be obvious,and looked at it. it was so bright i couldn't make out the shape entirely,but it was square shaped maybe that of a cross with the external lights being bright white on all ends of the cross and a deep red glowing center that pulsated. it may have been anywhere from 30 ft to 100ft ,hard to tell,but absolutely  no sound as it gently drifted in a precise straight line from north to south.I felt a little panicked,and had the urge to follow it. however, it was cold,wet and very late so i just watched it disappear over the forest. i stayed awake until dawn just because of an odd feeling i had that it might return.
content.summary: 4 intense white exterior lights and a central red pulsating light,cross shaped object made no sound ,traversed slowly

content.detailedDescription:
While trying to fall asleep in my bedroom i closed my eyes to mediate and i as i opened them i saw a large triangle shaped air vehicle with bright white lights go quickly passed my field of vision.  the object would have gone over one of my neighbor's home from where i witnessed it.
this was on friday, november 15th 2013

i was going to quickly let my husband know what had just happened, but he was sleeping and i thought to tell him the next day.

i was having difficulty sleeping even more after that sighting, and i just laid in bed with the window in my sight and began so dose off, but i opened my eyes again just in time to see either the same flying object or another one that was on the same path.

i was not afraid, but excited for the experience. i've had a couple other sightings throughout my life beginning when i was young. one six  years ago while driving cross country from ca. to md.  another was 4 years ago early in the morning while walking my dog.
content.summary: @22:22 i opened myes and saw a large v shaped air ship flying from south over my neighbor's house. i saw another one approx 1 hr. later.

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i had left a cafe just before 10pm saturday, 11/9/13, and were traveling north on us hwy 27 through chattanooga, tn. i noticed 4 bright reddish-white lights in what appeared to be a square formation apparently hovering over the (tennessee) riverfront area ahead, and called their attention to my wife. my first inclination was that they were candles sent aloft by helium-filled balloons, but it was quickly evident that the formation was too stable, it was not rising, and the lights were both too bright and too consistent to be candles. 
    large, public outdoor events are frequently held at the chattanooga riverfront, and my first thought was that the lights were in some way connected to an event in progress. we could see the lights while driving for almost a minute as we approached the bridge, and as soon as we reached the river and could tell that there was no event taking place, i immediately pulled our car to the "shoulder" about 100 ft. onto the bridge (which is over half a mile across.) i got out of the car and attempted to video record the objects with my iphone. (the results were of poor quality and inconclusive.)
    as we watched, the objects were completely silent. they hovered in (what appeared from our viewing angle to be) a square, oriented almost due-north/south and due east/west, for approximately an additional 30 seconds. then the southeastern-most light slowly departed toward the southeast, apparently in a gradual ascent, until it finally disappeared into the bottom of the cloud cover. the clouds were highly unlikely to have been lower than 800 ft. above the river (1400 ft above sea level), or higher than 3000 ft. above the river (3600 ft above sea level.) (determined by known local elevations.) 
    as the one light ascended to the southeast, the northeastern-most light slowly moved toward the south and then a bit west, leaving the remaining 3 lights in an inverted "check-mark" formation.
    after attempting to record the phenomena for approximately 2 minutes, realizing that the results were going to be poor, i decided to try and take still photos instead. during the roughly 15 to 20 seconds that i was looking away from the lights at my phone to re-set it from video to still mode, the objects disappeared. they had appeared to be rising, though barely perceptibly, when i looked away. the lights were in our constant view for over 5 minutes in total.
    i believe the low-level clouds were descending as fog (a common occurrence locally) and the lights disappeared into them. however, as bright as they had been, it would have been normal to expect a slight glow for at least a few moments as the lights would have been enveloped by the cloud, but there was no glow. 
    we live in a regular flight path of the rescue helicopter from chattanooga's large regional trauma center. we are very aware of the sound of a helicopter, even from a distance of one to two miles. these objects produced no sound, whereas 4 helicopters would have been obvious. moreover, there was no rotor-reflection glow, and it is highly unlikely that 4 helicopters could have hovered in such relatively close proximity to each other.
    i looked for other reports of the incident but found none. due to a hectic schedule, i failed to report the event in a timely manner. recalling it today--10 days after-- i decided to record the incident while the facts are still fresh in my mind.
content.summary: 4 lights hovering silently, one departs

content.detailedDescription: I was in yuba city california at approximately 9:30 p.M. on november 18th 2013. i looked out my back sliding glass window on the upper level and noticed some burning lights coming from the south, heading towards me. i went outside to take a look and there were multiple lights emitting from the south moving north crossing over my house and dissipating through the cloud line. at first i was taken back by the sightings as they kept coming at random times one after another and sometimes and twos. i was baffled at first but after observing them for quite some time i came to the conclusion that these were some sort of candles or flaming objects attached to balloons that had been released not too far away and were floating from the south to the north. the balls of light or (fireballs) began extinguishing after hitting the cloud line where more moisture would be present.
content.summary: Fireball type lights originating from south horizon at random intervalls following same flight pattern with inconsistent speed but minimal change, headed north where dissipated through cloud line.

content.detailedDescription:
On 9/28/2013 at 4:22 pm, i was returning from walking my dog.  we were in our courtyard and saw a huge + shaped object with a similarly sized curved object next to it.  it was a burnished metal and sitting silently in the air.  i would estimate it at 5-8000 feet high, 300+ feet in length.  i pointed at it with my phone and thought i got a picture of it.  i ran inside to get my camera.  i called to my room mate and she came out and witnessed it as it was crossing the tree line of our building.  my new sony sx50hs camera refused to focus with multiple attempts. 
see attached photos (photo-shopped image of the ufo structures)  actual photo taken of object (only a small dot & peripheral surrounding dots appear on camera)
on 10/10/13 a perfect heart shaped cloud appears at the same place in the sky. (see photo)
content.summary: Saw 2 objects hovering and then moving in the sky above my courtyard.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog about an hour after midnight, when looked to the skies i noticed this formation of about five lights. it was a quiet night, no wind, no clouds. the part of the city i live is very peaceful, but i was not able to hear any sound from this formation. when i first noticed it they were to my left, in direction of south-west. at first, i thought it is just my imagination, but as i looked at it moving across the night sky i realized it is real. light were kind of blurry, as when you would see a car head lights in the fog (but there was no fog or clouds on this particular night). as i starred they just vanished. would like to note that no airport is in that direction, and that commercial planes do not fly over my town in that direction. would also like to point that i haven't seen any object, only those lights flying silently in a triangular formation.
content.summary: Group of lights in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside looking at orion. time was just a few minutes after 5am, est. i panned the sky to my left facing south east when all of a sudden, directly in my line of sight, three lights in a perfect triangle just causally passed over head. the lights were not brilliant. more as if there was a mist or cloud cover. the sky itself was perfectly clear with no clouds anywhere visable. the odd thing about the triangle was how it was moving. instead of being flat and just moving, it had a wobble to it. the triangle was one light in the front and two in the back. it had a slight wobble. not a fast one, but in the 4 seconds it took to pass over head, it wobbled left to right, left to right. so only to full tilts or slight wabbles. i watched for another 5 minutes, but nothing else.
content.summary: Three lights forming a perfect triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was setting up my camera for the comet ison fly by. i took three practice shots of the moon. later examining the shots i noticed these anomalies. i saucer shaped object. one structure, and one machine that looks like a jet engine. i used photoshop to clarify the images. i still have the originals unformatted. i also have a set of the originals in jpeg format.
content.summary: Object on moon in high definition camera shots

content.detailedDescription: Went out to get my dip out of my truck. it was between 11:30 and 11:45pm. i first noticed the object because of the brightness of the white pulsating light. it was to the southwest of my location. when i first saw it, i knew immediately that it was very strange. i watched it get closer and closer and when it was just about over-head, the white pulsating light got really bright and then very dim. it continued to do this several times before leaving a white streak across the sky from the speed in which it sped off at. it almost looked like a shooting star except i was able to see the streak it left much longer than that of a shooting star. after seeing it, i came inside and looked up a video of the space station. in the video, it was moving at a steady pace across the sky. this was definitely not the space station. this object was traveling very slowly up to the point that it started pulsating bright and then dim several times before speeding out of site. right before it sped out of site, it looked as if the white light went dim and then flashed two times. i cant be sure it did flash two times but this is how it looked to me. my feelings after realizing that it was not the space station was amazing. i even felt a little over-whelmed at what i saw. it made no noise at all. it was raining here about 20 minutes before i went out to my truck so, it was below the cloud cover. very hard to determine its altitude but, the speed in which it left the white streak behind was mind numbing. comparing it to anything that we know to fly, nothing could have caught this, nothing.
content.summary: Bright white pulsating orb

content.detailedDescription: I saw this object in the sky above the reporters head during a live broadcast of the news.
content.summary: While watching the evening news i observed this object appear over the reporters head while on love tv

content.detailedDescription: My 18 year old son and i were closing house for the night and so put the dog out to go to the bathroom. i saw the large orange light through the trees then it moved into a clear area over the uncovered patio. i asked my son several times what it was. we agreed it was an unidentified object but he believed it was much higher in the atmosphere than what i believed i saw. as it went overhead, it appeared to me to be a slowly spinning oval shape with a bright orange light below. he believes it was space junk entering the atmosphere, but it was moving too slowly, almost gently gliding or floating, and there was no trail or tail. he said it burned out when i ran inside to go to the front porch. we looked around the house in the front and back finding no debris. it was a fairly clear night with stars visible and one or two clouds in the distance. there is a nearby air force base that flies drones. this object was about one tenth the size of a full moon.
content.summary: Fiery silent slowly spinning oval losing altitude moving south to north. seen from back porch. went to front porch to follow but could no longer see it.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work. i looked put my window figuring what to do next on my list of to dos. and as soon as i looked out i saw what looked like a round super shiny ball flying up a creves near ben lomond peak here on ogden. it last just seconds and dissapeard. i searched for it after losing sight. but was too hard to find because of the recent snow. i can't explain what i saw. most definitely unexplained flying object. i was in the valley below in north ogden and o saw whatever it was north east of my window.
content.summary: Shiny round ball

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my local video store family video. after noticing star directly in front of me i proceeded to take a photograph of it. i took two separate pictures to try and get the star in the best possible focus. days past before i looked back over the photograph i noticed the object in both pictures. in the first photo the lights appear white and in the latter they appear to be red.  there were no airplanes, helicopters,  weather-ballons and no noise coming from the object.  local mild traffic with nothing out of the ordinary.  looking at the lights and slots so i doubted that it was a drone or any such vehicle.  i would like the photograph to be confirmed by others to verify it not being something long the lines of a glare or ballon. i do believe it to be an ufo or something other-worldly.
content.summary: Took photos of star in background.  later saw object in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I encountered 2 lights above my roof while sitting in my car waiting for my husband to come outside.  

there were stars out but these two lights caught my eye because they were bright and close together and they moved too.  they were keeping the formation of as they moved south over my house but must have been moving quickly as i accidentally took a picture first and then tried to video but they seem to fade off in the distance so quickly;  about 10 seconds on a clear night with no trees or buildings in the way.  

when i went back to look at the picture and video, i didn't see anything on the video as usual.  however when my camera had taken a picture with the flash on, i was able to zoom in close enough to make out a disc shape of the two lights.  but the lights didn't look like lights this time but more like reflections.
content.summary: 2 lights moving south over house

content.detailedDescription: At 6:30pm on 11/18/2013 i was listening to the scanner. i was tuned to the frequency of 245.100 and heard a lot of traffic. knowing this to be a military aircraft frequency i decided to take a look outside to see if anything was going on in the sky. i noticed a very bright object about 15 degrees above the treetops to the sw of my house. i observed this object move up, down, and sideways several times. it would get really dim then brighten, and repeat the process over and over. it appeared to be hovering or moving in a circle. i noticed a couple of bright flashes coming from this object, the another smaller bright light appeared to the left of it. it did not stay lit, it just flashed and went out. after this happened the larger object descended to treetop level. it again brightened and dimmed several times. it finally went completely out. at almost the same instant the object went out an airplane light started blinking and was heading in the direction of the larger object. this airplane apparently had its lights off until this object went out. the general direction of this object was in the direction of fort leonard wood army base so it could have been a military exercise. i will also mention this activity has been going on since october in my area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright star like object hovering in sw above treetops

content.detailedDescription: At about 5:20 pm, i went outside to go to my car to have a cigarette. i looked up in the sky across the road which is east of the driveway. i saw an orange glowing light through the trees across the street. it seemed to be moving slowly, but i realized that when planes are coming towards you they seem to move slow. there was no sound like a plane or jet engine would make. i got into my car and turned on the radio on low and smoked my cigarette. when i got out of the car, i looked up in the sky to see if the light was still where i had seen it. it wasn't there, so i looked farther to the north, which is when i saw that the one light i had seen in the beginning had turned into 3 orange yellow lights. they were in an inverted v formation with the middle light a little behind the two side lights. again they were not blinking and they made no noise. they were well above the tree line but not as far up as some of the usual blinking lights that i see from the planes around here. truthfully, i thought it must be some kind of new aircraft that i am not aware of. i have never seen a plane with steady orange lights before. and it made no sound whatsoever. so thinking it was just some kind of new aircraft, i went back into the house. later, when the man i live with came home from a meeting, i asked him what kind of plane has those kind of lights and no sound. he brought up boomerang shaped ufo's. so i googled it on yahoo and some rense site mentioned an increase in sightings of ufo's with orange lights. so i decided to contact you. i really don't know what it was. there is a small airport in a nearby town, so we have all kinds of small planes and jets in the skies at night. i am kind of excited that it could be an alien craft! i have wanted to see a ufo as an adult, since i had seen 3 ufos in broad daylight and close when i was about 8 or 9 years old. by the way, it was dark tonite when i saw the object with a full moon to the east. it was not moving erratically or suddenly; just a slow easy path!
content.summary: Object was a steady glowing lite with no sound, ten minutes later saw it leaving as 3 glowing steady lites in a reverse v  shape

content.detailedDescription: It was 7:52 p.M. in the city of lakeland, florida when the incident occurred. when the incident occurred i was outside of my apartment star gazing with my binoculars. the nighttime sky was clear of stars so i planned to come inside shortly. i then noticed as i was gazing over my apartment building out of the corner of the lens i saw a bright light. i instinctively turned the binoculars toward the light thinking it was a helicopter. i then saw a hovering oval shaped craft with a series of circular lights around the oval. i thought to myself "it's only a helicopter." i stood there and had a sense of fear instilled in me remembering earlier experiences i had had with the e.T. had they come back to get me? i watched as the craft stood still not moving an inch just hovering in the night time sky. the craft omitted orange/red lights. i then quickly ran inside in fear of my life.
content.summary: I was outside star gazing when what appeared to be a ufo was spotted.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were watching sunday night football last night and right before half time i noticed strange lights doing odd maneuvers in the broadcast cutaway shot of downtown denver
as my husband is a total nonbeliever i never said a thing about it, but as we record every bronco game i have proof of what i saw--see attached clip
content.summary: Strange lights above denver colorado filmed during football game

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a cigarette outside our hotel and looked up at a passing plane heading west. i then saw a disk like object with a redish light very close to the plane which i felt was strange but this was not a helicopter or a plane because it started to head north and went from right to left at a ridiculous speed and then shot at a blink of an eye north west. i called faa but they told me to contact someone that wasnt in the "threat department" but it was a threat because it was flying so close to the plane. i called back but got no where so i really have to report this because it was something that we do not possess for technology that i know of, whatever this thing was... please get back to me if youve heard similar calls please.

---ryan
content.summary: Looked up at a plane passing by in nashville and saw a disk like object fly near by at rate ive never seen before. went right to left first before taking off.

content.detailedDescription: late last night,early morning, i was working on my laptop in bed. i saw a light through my window,very bright slowly traversing the sky. there were no other light outside. it was pitch black because the moon was covered by  heavy cloud cover. it had just rained about 30 min ago. very easy to notice a pulsating light in the sky,especially flying very low and very slowly. i went to the window and noticed it had a square shape maybe that of a cross with bright white lights on the ends and a pulsating red light in the center. there was absolutely no sound as it crossed the sky. i continued to watch it for 7 min. until it disappeared in a southerly direction.I felt sort of bothered,frightened unsure if it were going to come back. i stayed awake till sunrise sort of waiting for something to happen. i had a very strong desire to follow it but it was too cold and wet and thought better not. the object gently moved south until out of sight
content.summary: Appeared at 5:09 on monday ,glowed,pulsated and flew in a direct line very slowly

content.detailedDescription: Looking at photos of hawaii trip and noticed what looks like a ufo in three frames. i was in hawaii the big island. i think heilo side taking pictures of sunset. i wasn't aware of the object until two weeks ago, looking at photos of hawaii trip. i noticed something in the picture and zoomed in. wow a ufo! i don't know if indeed this is a ufo and if it is, i don't know if it's man made or alien.
content.summary: Didn't notice....Camera cought object

content.detailedDescription: 2 witness two towns apart see same object. a friend calls me at 23:05 and says he saw a beam of light come down then noticed a bright object, too big and luminous to be a star or planet. he was about 17miles north from here, i went out to my driveway and saw the same object. a random pulsating red light was showing at the top. other light anomolies were blinking under it's 5 o'clock position which he confirmed he also saw. observed for 20minutes before i went in. and he lost view after going behind mountain. have noticed the same type of thing was seen from here on 4/11/2011.
content.summary: Hovering bright object with red light pulsing on top ..Star like

content.detailedDescription: Others and myself see this orb almost every single night in the same spot in the sky. looking out over the ocean from beach in oceanside ca, you can see it up in the night sky. looks like a huge star but glows much brighter. usually returns to same spot every night. have witnessed balls of light detach from object and then re group with object. no idea what it could be. no sound emitted. sometimes will change path direction with no previous motion in that direction. baffled. stays in sky till about 8:45-9:00 pm every night. west direction over pacific ocean.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orb appears every single night lately. looking at over the pacific ocean from oceanside or san clemente. resembles large white star but it often moves

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Large craft 2 large reddish/orange circular lights under craft rising slowly with many white orbs surrounding it as it traveled and the orbs would change positions as it moved with the main craft as it looked like they were protecting it...It moved slowly n/w over the mountians west of congress az....I was in car going 55 mpr...Lites made me see it.Maybe a helicopter but soon i said to myself no-way..Amazed i saw it..Kids seen it..Grand son scared....When i stoped near congress az.  a white bronco pulled next to me and asked if i was ok...The he ..A middle aged white man w/ dark hair sped away in direction of space craft.....10 to 15 minutes of observation...It was moving slow    ..I felt like i saw the mother of all ufos with someone important on board  site seeing the earth..
content.summary: Traveling in car with 2 kids saw 2 redish yellow lite slowly rising to my left side  with many orbs sournding it  one orb moved from front to back as the entire fleet move up and n/w slowly

content.detailedDescription: We were in our back yard, we were supposed to have a meteor shower that evening. we usually see a lot of satellites. we were looking toward the south, when we  happened to notice a very bright orange/white object overhead...Then we observed several more, almost in sequence, moving slowly from sw to ne. we watched for over 20 minutes as they passed over head, then disappeared. there was  no sound at all. we have no explanation for what we witnessed. i am a private pilot and it was unlike anything i've seen before. we checked the news that night to see if anyone had reported anything, nothing was mentioned.
content.summary: Bright glowing objects, orange in front and white in back. moving slowly from sw to ne, no sound at all. about 2500 feet high.(est) i'm a pilot, so that's a guess.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 6 friends where walking in the old town area of arvada colorado at around 5:30 in the evening.One of the girls pointed to the south and ask me what kind of aircraft those are,as my career is aviation.The three yellow orange lights on the horizon where in a staggered left and down formation and where stationary.The bottom object then turned towards the west and appeared to have a sparkling tail on it.The middile object disappeared and reapered then all three moved in various directions and would disappear and reappear for a few more minutes until all three disappeared for good.Anouther passerby said he had seen the same objects at various locations over the denver metro skyline for a few weeks
content.summary: Three  orange yellow lights with sparking tails over denver metro area

content.detailedDescription:
On november 17, 2013 at approximately 1845, i was checking on a storage unit about 3 miles out on us hwy 290 west. as i was returning to my vehicle, i happened to look up at the night sky. this was the first night in several nights where it was a clear night sky. 

i looked back toward 290 west (in a southern direction) and began looking at the stars and various aircraft (mostly small private planes) flying in the area. i'm saying they were small private planes due to the other lights that i could see, such as the green and red blinking lights that accompany the white light. the characteristics of these lights were similar to those of other planes, i have observed in the area. 

i then observed a single bright white light almost directly overhead. i did not see any other lights attached to the this object such as the green and or red blinking lights one would except to see so that someone could make the assumption that what one was looking at was nothing more that an aircraft. 

i observed that this bright white object was moving south. from my vantage point the direction the object would have taken would be somewhere between kerrville and san antonio. i observed the this bright white object was not descending (falling to the ground) but was traveling at an unknown altitude toward the south. the speed of the object was constant but not fast.

i then observed a smaller aircraft off in the distance to the southwest. i could see the faint white light and the accompanying red and green blinking lights on this aircraft. i observed that this plane was flying from west to east. i observed that this plane appeared to be much further off in the distance and close to the horizon. 

i then looked back up and found the bright white object still overhead and continuing its southern flight. since i had now observed a plane much further off in the distance with a faint white light and red and green blinking lights, i was now beginning to wonder what this object was that i was observing.

i then retrieved my binoculars (10 x 50 fixed) from my vehicle. i located the bright white object through my binoculars and focused. i could not make out any detail of the object but i could also still not see any other lights, red, green, blue, nothing no other lights were accompanying this object.

i also noted that the speed of this object was increasing. before when i first observed the object there was no noticeable increase in speed and my head was only moving slightly but now i noticed that as i was observing this object through my binoculars my head was moving faster as i followed this object. i was even able to see this object pass in front of stars at a fast clip as it continued its southern flight path.

just out of curiosity i lowered my binoculars in an attempt to locate the aircraft i had seen earlier flying from west to east to see how close these two objects were in relation to one another. to my surprise i was able to easily locate the plane still on course from west to east but i could no longer see the bright white object. 

i searched the night sky for a few more minutes and never located this object again. as bright as this object was i should have been able to easily locate it again with my naked eye as i done in the first place. i know that this object was not a satellite nor was it any type of conventional aircraft that i have seen to date.

the total time i observed this object from start to finish was less than 2 minutes.

i was the only witness (that i know of) and no photos were taken.
content.summary: Bright white light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I took pictures with my iphone 5 of airplane's while driving on the highway from columbus ga to columbia sc and after looking at the pictures i seen the object.The first picture shows the object and the second one was taken maybe 2-3 min after the first one and show no object.
content.summary: Past by atl airport and took pictures of airplane's.I did not see the object until after i looked at the picture.

content.detailedDescription: On saturday at about 11:30 pm to 12:00 midnight, i went and sat on my front porch to smoke a cigarette.I look up at the sky.Because.Earlier in the evening a was looking at the full moon. then i saw what looked like a round ball of fire.Traveling from the southeast as if it were coming from the ocean.I live just outside the city limits , so there is not much lighting. when i first saw it i could not explain  what it was. i started calling my friend to come outside to see it.At this time, the object got so close but we could still not see any  shape or form,only a bright burning orange light.Then it just cut from its west movement to a northern path where it accelerated and it just vanished. then we looked over where this thing came from and there was a second ball of fire coming from the same direction as the first.We took out our cellphones.And they both were completely turn of ,and we just could not get them to turn on, to record anything. it to took the same fly path as the first one.But this one i could see what looked like just tips on its side they were silver metallic in color. i have never seen anything like this before. we were in shock because we could not explain what we saw.
content.summary: Ball of orange light all around w/ wings or saucer tips

content.detailedDescription: Took the dog outside and noticed a very bright object in the sky. at first it looked like a quasar but then i noticed it was moving across the mountain tops in a slow deliberate line. there was no sound as it moved but it moved so slow that it could not be an aircraft such as a plane or helicopter. the light from the object changed color from red to orange to yellow in quick succession. i watched as the object disappeared behind the mountains but noticed that the light from it gave off a bright aura that never changed its brightness. as it slowly came back from behind the mountains it continued on its slow deliberate path until it went behind a larger group of mountains and i could not see it again. i honestly have never seen anything that bright or slow moving in the sky. it was a moonless night and the skies were clear. i am a former soldier who's mos dealt directly with aircraft identification so i know the difference between small prop planes, jets and helicopters. i do not know if there were any local radar tracks that could confirm what i saw.
content.summary: Quasar looking light
